review: Chromecast has one of the simplest setup interfaces for any kind of electronic device I've ever used. At 30 bucks, I can't believe I hadn't ordered one before. If a non-Google company had built something like this first and tried to sell it through Best Buy, it'd be at least $100, but Google comes to the rescue again. If you use tablets, your smartphone, or your laptop to watch Netflix, HBO Go, Showtime, YouTube, or even to stream Spotify or Pandora, coupling that up to a Chromecast gives you instant wireless connection to your home entertainment system. Highly, highly recommended.
author: Dan
